2.text: Move your tongue toward the back of your throat.

3.text: Shape your mouth into an "O" shape.

4.text: Push small amounts of smoke out.

5.text: After you master the basic technique, try to blow rings with backspin.

6.text: To make your O's travel faster and farther, try to incorporate a speedy tongue push along with a rapid jut of your jaw.

7.text: Use your lips to affect the distance traveled by smoke rings.

8.text: Blow smoke rings with a light tap of the cheek.

9.text: Use the tongue-push method for smoke rings.

10.text: Use a cellophane wrapper to get smoke rings.
